body:
A Global Surface Summary of the Day (GSOD) Weather Data Client for R
[https://docs.ropensci.org/GSODR/](https://docs.ropensci.org/GSODR/)

Additionally the r-countrycode package has been added as a dependency.
For gcc-10 compatibility the r-data-table has been updated as well.
title: Adds new R package: GSODR
